channel.title: How do i
channel.description:
first of all....i still cant change the text of the logout button. i cant find that certain type of coding people were refering to. second is there a way to limit the amount of people that go onto my server ex. i want to limit the number of players to go on to 8. and thirdly why wont the mage work anymore. every time i select a spell the player will just walk up to the NPC. this server is all java coded. ALso how do i kick people off the server????
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ADDED:.....
Why now is it every time that I log on, the game freezes?

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @bode bode
item.description:
@bode wrote:

Pwnd:

And if the number is to high, tell the people to fhk off or something.

well said

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

And for restricting your amount of players, make a counter where each client thread is made, and put an if statement, or so. And if the number is to high, tell the people to fhk off or something.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @bode bode
item.description:
@bode wrote:

The most easy way to change the text of logout button is search the source name untill you run across the log out text then play with it…

And as meep said to kick a player you do ::kick (player) - EX. ::kick Bode

Read full topic
